template<class GAMECLASS>
class CaptionTest< GAMECLASS >

A test class for TerminalAPI caption widget.

template<class GAMECLASS>
void CaptionTest< GAMECLASS >::testCaptionHeight (  )  [inline]

Tests the Caption height field.

It simply set a new height to the Caption and test if the type given by Caption::getHeight() is the same.

Definition at line 165 of file captiontest.h.

template<class GAMECLASS>
void CaptionTest< GAMECLASS >::testCaptionText (  )  [inline]

Tests the Caption text field.

It simply set a new text to the Caption and test if the string given by Caption::getText() is the same.
